welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cisauk, Indonesia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's natural beauty, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cisauk has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal divided into three sub-terminals, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a login is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
